___oxElevenGenerateKeyEndpoint.description: URL for the oxEleven Generate Key Endpoint.

___configurationUpdateInterval.description: The interval for configuration update in seconds.

___invalidateSessionCookiesAfterAuthoriz.description: Boolean value to specify whether to invalidate `session_id` and `consent_session_id` cookies right after successful or unsuccessful authorization

___keyRegenerationEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to regenerate keys.

___requestUriParameterSupported.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports use of the request_uri parameter.

___accessTokenLifetime.description: The lifetime of the short lived Access Token.

___umaConfigurationEndpoint.description: URL for the UMA Configuration Endpoint.

___authorizationEndpoint.description: The URL of the Authorization Endpoint.

___idTokenEncryptionAlgValuesSupported.description: A list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) supported by the OP for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT.

___dynamicRegistrationScopesParamEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable scopes parameter in dynamic registration.

___authorizationCodeLifetime.description: The lifetime of the Authorization Code.

___skipAuthorizationForOpenIdScopeAndPai.description: If a client has only openid scope and pairwise id, person should not have to authorize.

___oxId.description: URL for the Inum generator Service.

___idTokenTokenBindingCnfValuesSupported.description: Array containing a list of the JWT Confirmation Method member names supported by the OP for Token Binding of ID Tokens. The presence of this parameter indicates that the OpenID Provider supports Token Binding of ID Tokens. If omitted, the default is that the OpenID Provider does not support Token Binding of ID Tokens.

___endSessionEndpoint.description: URL at the OP to which an RP can perform a redirect to request that the End-User be logged out at the OP.

___clientInfoEndpoint.description: The URL of the Client Info Endpoint.

___useLocalCache.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable local in-memory cache for attributes, scopes, clients and organization configuration.

___endSessionWithAccessToken.description: Accept access token to call end_session endpoint.

___idTokenLifetime.description: The lifetime of the ID Token.

___pairwiseCalculationSalt.description: Salt to calculate algorithmic pairwise IDs.

___httpLoggingExludePaths.description: List of base URI for which request/response logging filter should not record activity.

___opPolicyUri.description: URL that the OpenID Provider provides to the person registering the Client to read about the OP's requirements on how the Relying Party can use the data provided by the OP.

___useCacheForAllImplicitFlowObjects.description: Boolean value to specify whether to persist all objects into cache during Implicit Flow.

___trustedClientEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether a client is trusted and no authorization is required.

___opTosUri.description: URL that the OpenID Provider provides to the person registering the Client to read about OpenID Provider's terms of service.

___cleanServiceBatchChunkSize.description: Each clean up iteration fetches chunk of expired data per base dn and removes it from storage.

___idTokenEncryptionEncValuesSupported.description: A list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) supported by the OP for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT.

___logClientNameOnClientAuthentication.description: Boolean value to specify if application should log the Client Name on client authentication.

___dynamicGrantTypeDefault.description: A list of the OAuth 2.0 Grant Type values that it's possible to set via client registration API.

___personCustomObjectClassList.description: LDAP custom object class list for dynamic person enrollment.

___idGenerationEndpoint.description: URL for the ID Generation Endpoint.

___sectorIdentifierEndpoint.description: URL for the Sector Identifier Endpoint.

___sessionIdPersistOnPromptNone.description: Boolean value specifying whether to persist session ID on prompt none.

___updateClientAccessTime.description: Boolean value to specify if application should update oxLastAccessTime/oxLastLogonTime attributes on client authentication.

___oxElevenSignEndpoint.description: URL for the oxEleven Sign Endpoint.

___userInfoEncryptionAlgValuesSupported.description: A list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) JWA supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT.

___tokenEndpoint.description: The URL of the Token Endpoint.

___openidScopeBackwardCompatibility.description: Set to false to only allow token endpoint request for openid scope with grant type equals to authorization_code, restrict access to userinfo to scope openid and only return id_token if scope contains openid.

___spontaneousScopeLifetime.description: The lifetime of spontaneous scope in seconds.

___tokenEndpointAuthSigningAlgValuesSupp.description: A list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by the Token Endpoint for the signature on the JWT used to authenticate the Client at the Token Endpoint for the private_key_jwt and client_secret_jwt authentication methods.

___logClientIdOnClientAuthentication.description: Boolean value to specify if application should log the Client ID on client authentication.

___authenticationFiltersEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable user authentication filters.

___responseTypesSupported.description: A list of the OAuth 2.0 response_type values that this OP supports.

___requestObjectEncryptionAlgValuesSuppo.description: A list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) supported by the OP for Request Objects.

___sessionIdRequestParameterEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable session_id HTTP request parameter.

___serviceDocumentation.description: URL of a page containing human-readable information that developers might want or need to know when using the OpenID Provider.

___displayValuesSupported.description: A list of the display parameter values that the OpenID Provider supports.

___uiLocalesSupported.description: Languages and scripts supported for the user interface.

___checkSessionIFrame.description: URL of an OP iframe that supports cross-origin communications for session state information with the RP Client, using the HTML5 postMessage API.

___frontChannelLogoutSessionSupported.description: Boolean value to specify support for front channel logout session.

___dynamicRegistrationEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable Dynamic Registration.

___claimsLocalesSupported.description: Languages and scripts supported for values in Claims being returned.

___idTokenSigningAlgValuesSupported.description: A list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by the OP for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT.

___claimsParameterSupported.description: Specifies whether the OP supports use of the claims parameter.

___sessionIdEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable authentication by session_id.

___dynamicRegistrationExpirationTime.description: Expiration time in seconds for clients created with dynamic registration, -1 means never expire.

___сookieDomain.description: Cookie Domain (sets domain for all cookies created by OP)

___cleanServiceBaseDns.description: List of additional base dns under which AS will look up for expired entities

___openidSubAttribute.description: LDAP attribute used for the sub claim.

___enableClientGrantTypeUpdate.description: Boolean value to specify if client can update Grant Type values.

___metricReporterEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable Metric Reporter.

___clientWhiteList.description: White List for Client Redirection URIs.

___dynamicRegistrationCustomAttributes.description: Custom attributes for the Dynamic registration.

___tokenRevocationEndpoint.description: The URL of the Token (access_token or refresh_token) Revocation Endpoint.

___userInfoEncryptionEncValuesSupported.description: A list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) JWA supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT.

___oxElevenDeleteKeyEndpoint.description: URL for the oxEleven Delete Key Endpoint.

___openIdConfigurationEndpoint.description: URL for the Open ID Connect Configuration Endpoint.

___defaultSubjectType.description: Default Subject Type used for Dynamic Client Registration.

___clientBlackList.description: Black List for Client Redirection URIs.

___legacyDynamicRegistrationScopeParam.description: Legacy Dynamic Registration Scopes JSON Array Param.

___requestObjectSigningAlgValuesSupporte.description: A list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by the OP for Request Objects.

___sessionIdUnusedLifetime.description: The lifetime for unused session states.

___customHeadersWithAuthorizationRespons.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable Custom Response Header parameter to return custom headers with the Authorization Response.

___serverMetadataFolder.description: Authenticators metadata in json format. Example: virtual devices.

___unfinishedRequestExpiration.description: Expiration time in seconds for pending enrollment/authentication requests

___authenticationHistoryExpiration.description: Expiration time in seconds for approved authentication requests.

___userAutoEnrollment.description: Allow to enroll users on enrollment/authentication requests.

___introspectionAccessTokenMustHaveUmaPr.description: Reject introspection requests if access_token in Authorization header does not have uma_protection scope.

___requestObjectEncryptionEncValuesSuppo.description: A list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) supported by the OP for Request Objects.

___userInfoEndpoint.description: The URL of the User Info Endpoint.

___dynamicRegistrationCustomObjectClass.description: LDAP custom object class for dynamic registration.

___umaRestrictResourceToAssociatedClient.description: Restrict access to resource by associated client.

___updateUserLastLogonTime.description: Boolean value to specify if application should update oxLastLogonTime attribute on user authentication.

___umaRptAsJwt.description: Issue RPT as JWT or as random string.

___persistRefreshTokenInLdap.description: Specifies whether to persist refresh_token into LDAP (otherwise saves into cache).

___grantTypesSupported.description: A list of the OAuth 2.0 Grant Type values that this OP supports.

___dynamicRegistrationPersistClientAutho.description: Boolean value specifying whether to persist client authorizations.

___disableJdkLogger.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable JDK Loggers.

___clientAuthenticationFiltersEnabled.description: Boolean value specifying whether to enable client authentication filters.

___metricReporterInterval.description: The interval for metric reporter in seconds.

___umaValidateClaimToken.description: Validate claim_token as id_token assuming it is issued by local idp.

___defaultSignatureAlgorithm.description: The default signature algorithm to sign ID Tokens.

___subjectTypesSupported.description: A list of the Subject Identifier types that this OP supports. Valid types include pairwise and public.

___metricReporterKeepDataDays.description: The days to keep metric reported data.

___allowAuthorizationByAccessToken.description: DEPRECATED. Boolean value to specify whether to allow authorization by `access_token` at Authorization Endpoint. It will be removed in CE 4.0

___sessionIdUnauthenticatedUnusedLifetim.description: The lifetime for unused unauthenticated session states.

___sessionIdLifetime.description: The lifetime of session id in seconds. If 0 or -1 then expiration is not set. `session_id` cookie expires when browser session ends.

___keyRegenerationInterval.description: The interval for key regeneration in hours.

___claimTypesSupported.description: A list of the Claim Types that the OpenID Provider supports.

___cleanServiceInterval.description: Time interval for the Clean Service in seconds.

___requestParameterSupported.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports use of the request parameter.

___keyStoreSecret.description: The password of the Key Store.

___oxElevenJwksEndpoint.description: URL for the oxEleven JWKS Endpoint.

___oxElevenVerifySignatureEndpoint.description: URL for the oxEleven Verify Signature Endpoint.

___umaKeepClientDuringResourceSetRegistr.description: Save client information during resource registration

___tokenEndpointAuthMethodsSupported.description: A list of Client Authentication methods supported by this Token Endpoint.

___issuer.description: URL using the https scheme with no query or fragment component that the OP asserts as its Issuer Identifier.
___issuer.title: Issuer

___umaGrantAccessIfNoPolicies.description: Specify whether to grant access to resources if there is no any policies associated with scopes.

___requireRequestUriRegistration.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP requires any request_uri values used to be pre-registered using the request_uris registration parameter.

___errorHandlingMethod.description: A list of possible error handling methods.

___pairwiseCalculationKey.description: Key to calculate algorithmic pairwise IDs.

___jwksUri.description: URL of the OP's JSON Web Key Set (JWK) document. This contains the signing key(s) the RP uses to validate signatures from the OP.

___userInfoSigningAlgValuesSupported.description: A list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) JWA supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT.

___refreshTokenLifetime.description: The lifetime of the Refresh Token.

___externalLoggerConfiguration.description: Path to external log4j2 logging configuration.

___persistIdTokenInLdap.description: Specifies whether to persist id_token into LDAP (otherwise saves into cache).

___sessionAsJwt.description: Experimental feature. Do not use in production!

___responseModesSupported.description: A list of the OAuth 2.0 Response Mode values that this OP supports.

___umaAddScopesAutomatically.description: Add UMA scopes automatically if it is not registered yet

___allowPostLogoutRedirectWithoutValidat.description: Allows post logout redirect without validation for End Session Endpoint.

___shareSubjectIdBetweenClientsWithSameS.description: Share Subject ID between clients with same Sector ID.

___fapiCompatibility.description: Boolean value specifying whether turn on FAPI compatibility mode. If true AS behaves in more strict mode.
